adjectives.description: tormentful (comparative more tormentful, superlative most tormentful)

entries.meaning: Full of torment; causing, or accompanied by, torment; excruciating.
examples: Malice, and envy, and revenge , are unquiet paſsions; and in what nature soever they are, they are as vexatious and tormentful to itself, as they are troublesome and mischievous to others
